title: Ludovico Nitoglia
text:
Ludovico Maria Nitoglia (born 27 October 1983) is an Italian former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played as a <a href="Wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">Wing</a>.
With <a href="Rugby%20Calvisano">Calvisano</a>, Nitoglia won two Italian rugby championships in 2005 and 2008. He plays for <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton Treviso</a> in the <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a>, since 2010/11 to 2015/16, when he finished his career.
He had 17 caps for <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy</a>, from 2004 to 2006, without scoring. He played at the <a href="Six%20Nations%20Championship">Six Nations Championship</a> in 2005 and 2006, for 10 caps. He wasn't called for the <a href="2007%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2007 Rugby World Cup</a> and since then never returned to the national team, despite several callings.
